Lynchburg.Vines Center: The Vines Convocation Center (or The Vines Center) is an 9,547-seat multi-purpose arena in Lynchburg, Virginia. It was built in 1990 and is home to the Liberty University Flames (men's) and Lady Flames (women's) basketball teams. The Vines Center features three practice courts (1.5 each for men’s and women’s basketball), four spacious locker rooms, a weight room, a training room, men’s and women’s basketball team rooms, a team dining room, basketball coaches offices, a built-in TV studio, a center-hung scoreboard and a suite atop the seating bowl.
